trans-unit.source: The ManagementKey attribute identifies the key properties of a WMI class.
trans-unit.target: ManagementKey 屬性會識別在 WMI 類別的索引鍵的屬性。

trans-unit.source: Note: the WMI .NET libraries are now considered in final state, and no further development, enhancements, or updates will be available for non-security related issues affecting these libraries.
trans-unit.target: 注意︰ WMI.NET 程式庫目前被認為在最終狀態，而且沒有進一步開發之用，增強功能，或更新可供非安全性相關問題會影響這些程式庫。

trans-unit.source: The [MI APIs](https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/jj152383%28v=vs.80%29.aspx) should be used for all new development.
Unless a WMI class is a singleton, it can have multiple corresponding instances.
trans-unit.target: WMI 類別是一個 singleton，除非它可以有多個對應執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Clients of the class must be able to uniquely identify the specific instance they are interested in.
trans-unit.target: 類別的用戶端必須可以唯一地識別他們感興趣的特定執行個體。

trans-unit.source: So, as a provider writer, you must choose a property or set of properties that uniquely identify an instance of each of your WMI classes.
trans-unit.target: 因此，提供者撰寫人員，您必須選擇屬性或一組唯一識別每個 WMI 類別的執行個體的屬性。

trans-unit.source: You use the ManagementKeyAttribute attribute to identify those key properties.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用 ManagementKeyAttribute 屬性來識別這些索引鍵的屬性。

trans-unit.source: Properties identified as keys have the same runtime behavior as read-only properties indicated by the <xref:System.Management.Instrumentation.ManagementProbeAttribute> attribute.
trans-unit.target: 屬性識別為索引鍵具有唯讀屬性所指定相同的執行階段行為<xref:System.Management.Instrumentation.ManagementProbeAttribute>屬性。</xref:System.Management.Instrumentation.ManagementProbeAttribute>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref:System.Management.ManagementKeyAttribute> class.
